Server.Name: RH 41 7 Day Horde Edition
Server.Description: Version 4.1 Release of Ravenhearst for Single Player. It comes with a 72 slot Backpack and vanilla settings like weather enabled, 7 Day Blood Moons and profanity and nude zombies. For discussions and to submit any bugs please visit https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?76822-Ravenhearst-Mod or join our Discord at https://discord.gg/YBHD9f3

Server.Name: RH 41 21 Day Horde Edition
Server.Description: Version 4.1 Release of Ravenhearst for Single Player with Blood Moon spawning every 21 days. For discussions and to submit any bugs please visit https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?76822-Ravenhearst-Mod or join our Discord at https://discord.gg/YBHD9f3

Server.Name: DONA Ravenhearst Official Whitelist Server
Server.Description: DONA Ravenhearst 4.1 Files. These are for players on our whitelist server. You will NOT be able to play SP with these. They are for our server members ONLY.
